mapper.select: SELECT enfc_inst_unq_biz_no FROM tcm_biz_file_scrp_ls ORDER BY enfc_inst_unq_biz_no DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT file_id, lgc_file_nm as file_nm, file_sz as file_size, file_path_cn as file_path FROM tcm_biz_file_scrp_ls WHERE file_id=#{fileId} AND del_yn='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tcm_biz_file_scrp_ls ( file_id, enfc_inst_unq_biz_no, biz_korn_nm, biz_prd_bgng_yr, biz_prd_end_yr, biz_fld_nm, biz_rgn_cn, lgc_file_nm, phys_file_nm, file_path_cn, file_extn_cn, file_sz, file_pstn_secd, reg_dt, reg_user_id, mdfcn_dt, mdfcn_user_id, del_yn ) VALUES ( #{fileId}, #{enfcInstUnqBizNo}, #{bizKornNm}, #{bizPrdBgngYr}, #{bizPrdEndYr}, #{bizFldNm}, #{bizRgnCn}, #{lgcFileNm}, #{physFileNm}, #{filePathCn}, #{fileExtnCn}, #{fileSz}, #{filePstnSecd}, SYS_DATETIME, #{regUserId}, SYS_DATETIME, #{mdfcnUserId}, 'N' )
